name: Kayak
description:
Kayak

by Jon Coughlin

"A" paddles left
"D" paddles right

Tap to paddle, Hold to reverse - intended for touch interfaces, jam build only runs on Windows

A prototype made for the Constraints Jam in 40 working hours

Dev Log: https://clicktozoom.wordpress.com/

sounds by http://www.freesfx.co.uk/

Constraints

1. Game must not have a tutorial. (Intended for touch, A + D keys provided to help with keyboard input only)

2. Player has to die at least once every level.

3. Game must be controllable via keyboard, gamepad, touchscreen or mouse, with identical gameplay no matter which is used.
